title.name: Stephan Gilles
title.after: – I build modern web apps with Angular, TypeScript & JavaScript.

hero.subtitle: Focus: clean UI, clear structure, reliable features. Experience from team projects (e.g., Join) and personal implementations – available for junior roles.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Solid implementation – with a focus on maintainability, structure and clean UI.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Selected work – cleanly structured, responsive and built with real-world practice in mind.

join.title: Join – Kanban / Team App
join.desc: Team project with task management, login, persistence and a clearly structured UI architecture.

elpollo.title: El Pollo Loco – Jump & Run
elpollo.desc: Canvas game with OOP structure, collision logic, status bars and stable state management.

portfolio.title: Portfolio (Angular)
portfolio.desc: This portfolio as a standalone Angular app with routing, section-based layout and i18n.

pokedex.title: Pokédex (Angular)
pokedex.desc: Angular Pokédex using the PokéAPI with search, sorting and a detailed view (Overview/Stats/Evolution).

about.title: About
about.p1: I'm Stephan Gilles and I build web applications with a focus on clear structure, clean UI and reliable functionality. My main focus is Angular, TypeScript and modern frontend patterns.
about.p2: Maintainable code matters to me: meaningful naming, small functions, clean component separation and a solid Git workflow. I work in a structured way, test changes consistently in the browser and fix bugs in a traceable manner.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have a junior role or a project: feel free to reach out. I'll get back to you quickly.

content.title: Liability for content
content.p: The contents of this website have been created with the greatest care. However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the content.

links.title: Liability for links
links.p: This website may contain links to external third-party websites over whose content I have no influence. The respective provider or operator is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.

general.title: General
general.p: Protecting your personal data is important to me. This privacy policy explains which data is processed when you visit this website.

logs.title: Server log files
logs.p: When you access this website, the hosting provider may automatically store information in so-called server log files (e.g., IP address, browser type, time). This data is used for technical delivery and security.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p: If you contact me by email, the data you provide will be processed to handle your request.

external.title: External links
external.p: This website contains links to external sites (e.g., GitHub, LinkedIn). When you click such a link, the privacy policies of the respective provider apply.
